nodes.text: The Binarran Cloud was a Colonies sector that contained the Orthellin system. An affluent Orthellin royal mistress, who at one point owned the luxury yacht Lady Luck, originated from the Binarran Cloud.
The Binarran Cloud was first mentioned in Dark Force Rising Sourcebook, a 1992 supplement authored by Bill Slavicsek for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
